item.title: Large Hole in road, 26th June
item.description:
Police report a large sink hole in the carriageway. TFL Bus is stuck but this is being recovered. Thames Water have been called to attend to a water leak that has cause the hole. Highways needed to close road. Lawrie Park Road, Penge, SE26 6ED Junction of Crystal Palace Park Road Police Ref: 1188260625
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crystal Palace Park Road, Crystal Palace, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Manhole cover off in road in Vicarage Crescent., 26th June
item.description:
The manhole cover is off in Vicarage Crescent - it is surrounded by barriers. The two Battersea High St bus stops are closed because of this. The cover has been off for about a week now and causes significant inconvenience to residents and traffic congestion.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Vicarage Crescent, Battersea, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish not picked up, 25th June
item.description:
We took the rubbish out on time. However after checking few hours later, the rubbish was still there. No one picked up. Therefore we had to move the rubbish to the second location for a later pick up.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 16, D'Arblay Street, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping outside industrial estate, 25th June
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 85, Crampton Street, Elephant and Castle, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Awful sewage and rotten egg smell from drain, 25th June
item.description:
The drain on the street in front of 29 and 31 South Eaton Place clearly has sitting water backed up in it and has a foul sewage and rotten egg smell. It comes into the houses on the street any time you open a front door. It has been ongoing for almost a week now and not getting better. Please fix this.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 60-64, South Eaton Place, Belgravia, London
Report on FixMyStreet
